full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement
#### Request for Proposal: Hotel Accommodation at Pt. Mugu, California

**Tender Reference:** WS4705899349
**Publication Date:** July 30, 2024
**Tender Closing Date:** August 7, 2024, 2:00 PM EDT
**Solicitation Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding

**Background:** The Department of Public Works and Government Services (SPAC) on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND) invites bidders to provide accommodation services for the period from September 10 to September 24, 2024 in Pt. Mugu, California.

**Responsibilities:**

* Provide accommodation within a 15-mile drive from 1163 Sparrow Dr. NAS Point Mugu, California 93041
* Meet the accommodation requirements for the specified period

**Eligibility:** **Bidder must demonstrate a minimum of two years of experience in providing hotel accommodation services**

**Evaluation Criteria:**

* Lowest Price

**Bidder Requirements:**
- A Word document describing their proposed accommodation services
- A detailed breakdown of costs
- A proof of accommodation provision within the 15-mile radius of the NAS Point Mugu location
- Proof of business registration and license

**Trade Agreements:**

* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Contact Information:**
Elisan, Christine (SPAC/PSPC)
christine.elisan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
*She and her team can be reached through [Ariba Discovery](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/20451287?extsite=MjA0NTEyODdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==) for further information.

**Method of Submissions:** Submit proposals via Ariba Discovery, including all required supporting documentation by the specified tender closing date and time.

### Tender Information
You can download the tender documents and view details of the solicitation on [Ariba Discovery](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/20451287?extsite=MjA0NTEyODdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==).

**End User:** Department of National Defence (DND)
